title: Publisher Rocket review: New keywords and categories tool to sell books on KDP
description:
Get Rocket: https://creativindie--rocket.thrivecart.com/publisher-rocket/

There are some great keyword and category tools to give your book more visibility when publishing on KDP, but publisher rocket just got a nice updated with some new features that make it even more useful...


Book Marketing is Dead (free download): https://www.subscribepage.com/survivalguide1

Indie Author Basics: Free Survival Guide: https://creativindie.clickfunnels.com/optin-24185691

⚡☕⚡✍☕✍⚡☕⚡

Hey there - I'm Derek Murphy. I'm a fine artist who became a book cover designer, then started writing young adult scifi and fantasy. I've spent almost 20 years living abroad, have a PhD in comparative literature (revolutionary politics in Paradise Lost), and have been featured in CNN for renting castles to use as writing retreats. Although I'm not working with clients anymore, I've built a ton of resources to help indie authors write, design and publish bestselling books.
